description:
I am student council member Ikeda Chitose. Thank you for watching our show.
Toshino-san and her friends are enjoying an artistic fall and seem to be up to something interesting.
Art, huh? Ayano-chan should join them. Ayano-chan could model for Toshino-san as she draws (spurt!) or sculpts (gush!)
or writes about their love together (drip), right?
Artistic autumns are the best... (bam!).
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: あーと☆あーたー☆あーちすと
